markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cat's Eye Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3301)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you consume this elixir, your vision sharpens, and you become sensitive to even the most minute movements. For the next minute, you reduce the flat check to target [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79) creatures to 5, and you don't need to attempt a flat check to target [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Cat's Eye Elixir
